alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Weld and northwestern Morgan Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 624 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout tornado along a line extending from near Orchard to 6 miles southeast of Stoneham, or along a line extending from 17 miles west of Fort Morgan to 23 miles west of Sterling. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Landspout tornadoes can damage mobile homes, roofs, vehicles, and trees. Outdoor objects may be tossed about. Locations impacted include... New Raymer, Orchard, Antelope Springs, Stoneham, Weldona, Jackson Reservoir and Goodrich. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building.
